mapper.select: SELECT out_time FROM tb_house_status WHERE house_id=#{houseId} AND out_time>#{outTime} AND out_status=2;
SELECT * FROM tb_house_status WHERE house_id=#{houseId} AND out_time=#{outTime}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_house_status SET out_status=#{outStatus} WHERE house_id=#{houseId} AND out_time=#{outTime}
